<div infinite-scroll-distance="50" infinite-scroll-disabled="disabledInfiniteScroll"><div class="content"><div data-v-3fcceb94="" class="fav-value-tip-wrap fav-value-tip-wrap-contribute" style="display: none;"><img data-v-3fcceb94="" src="//s1.shuidichou.com/cf/static/img/di-3.7ff0164.png"> <span data-v-3fcceb94="" class="content">爱心值代表你在平台的爱心贡献度，爱心值越高，你的爱心等级越高。转发、捐款、帮患者证明，这些爱心行为都可以收获爱心值哟。</span> <span data-v-3fcceb94="" class="arrow"></span></div> <div class="left"><img src="http://thirdwx.qlogo.cn/mmopen/vi_32/Q0j4TwGTfTLMEXpOEkO2C6pUU2nlZdoNuzjNK0dfxkoeeribzFLpBMZSUNgsmAEnMPibal7NI7EfeeqCibqHULawA/132" class="img-head"></div> <div class="right"><div class="div-top"><p class="p-help-deco"><span class="nickname">
              阿泽
            </span> <span class="money-comment">
              帮助了 <em>10</em> 元

          </span> <span class="time common">22天前</span> <!----></div></div></div><div class="content"><div data-v-3fcceb94="" class="fav-value-tip-wrap fav-value-tip-wrap-contribute" style="display: none;"><img data-v-3fcceb94="" src="//s1.shuidichou.com/cf/static/img/di-3.7ff0164.png"> <span data-v-3fcceb94="" class="content">爱心值代表你在平台的爱心贡献度，爱心值越高，你的爱心等级越高。转发、捐款、帮患者证明，这些爱心行为都可以收获爱心值哟。</span> <span data-v-3fcceb94="" class="arrow"></span></div> <div class="left"><img src="http://thirdwx.qlogo.cn/mmopen/vi_32/DYAIOgq83eqJrY5xhjKqribAmffOhiasyfiaia49ibHM6aZpicLl2XOTW59lJq3VGKia1a37qmGDxkEZsJwX8gfGpTAOA/132" class="img-head"></div> <div class="right"><div class="div-top"><p class="p-help-deco"><span class="nickname">

          </span> <span class="time common">24天前</span> <!----></div></div></div><div class="content"><div data-v-3fcceb94="" class="fav-value-tip-wrap fav-value-tip-wrap-contribute" style="display: none;"><img data-v-3fcceb94="" src="//s1.shuidichou.com/cf/static/img/di-3.7ff0164.png"> <span data-v-3fcceb94="" class="content">爱心值代表你在平台的爱心贡献度，爱心值越高，你的爱心等级越高。转发、捐款、帮患者证明，这些爱心行为都可以收获爱心值哟。</span> <span data-v-3fcceb94="" class="arrow"></span></div> <div class="left"><img src="http://thirdwx.qlogo.cn/mmopen/vi_32/Q0j4TwGTfTLyfjHfjulibFBVCQZl1I22jyXoqXV1c8ibJc45M32n0uWNRWrpaibySBae1yiaAMibtWzE94sYxzYBWLQ/132" class="img-head"></div> <div class="right"><div class="div-top"><p class="p-help-deco"><span class="nickname">
